text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that Regulation 4(2) of the Electricity at Work Regulations 1989 requires electrical systems to be maintained \u201cso as may be necessary to prevent danger.\u201d The candidate answer explicitly mentions the Electricity at Work Regulations 1989 and states: \"Under Electricity at Work Regulations 1989, electrical equipment must be maintained in safe condition.\" While it does not quote Regulation 4(2) verbatim, it correctly identifies the relevant regulation and its core requirement regarding maintenance to prevent danger, which satisfies the intent of the criterion.", "criterion_id": "bfc9f422-a764-42bc-bc7b-8e1c9fc91ec0"}
